content: शापः [शप्-घञ्] {@--1@} A curse, an imprecation, anathema; शापेनास्तं गमितमहिमा वर्षभोग्येण भर्तुः <ls>Me. 1</ls>, <ls n="Me.">92</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 78</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 56</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">59</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 14.</ls> {@--2@} An oath, asseveration. {@--3@} Abuse, calumny. {@--4@} An interdiction, a ban.
